fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm network profile default addresses
fields.request_details: On a staging control node with the refreshed network role, run `ansible-playbook ansible/playbooks/control.yml --limit <host>` and then check `nmcli connection show eth0-shared` and `nmcli connection show gelectriic-ap`. Verify that eth0-shared reports 192.168.129.10/16 and gelectriic-ap reports 10.42.0.1/16 so the seeded fixtures remain valid. Capture screenshots or logs if the addresses differ.
